#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    long long int t,n,x,y,ans;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--){
      scanf("%lld",&n);
       x=n/26;
       y=n%26;
       if(y==0)
        ans=x;
       else
       ans=x+1;
      printf("%lld\n",ans);
      }
    return 0;
}
